attribute.description: The attribute function can be used to access a "dynamic" attribute of a variable

constant.description: constant returns the constant value for a given string

cycle.description: The cycle function cycles on an array of values

date.description: Converts an argument to a date to allow date comparison

dump.description: (function) dumps information about a template variable. This is mostly useful to debug a template that does not behave as expected by introspecting its variables

include.description: (function) returns the rendered content of a template

max.description: (function) returns the biggest value of a sequence or a set of values

min.description: (function) returns the lowest value of a sequence or a set of values

parent.description: (function)  return the content of the block as defined in the base template

random.description: (function) returns a random value depending on the supplied parameter type

range set.description: (function) Returns an array of elements from low to high, inclusive

range.description: (function) Returns an array of elements from low to high, inclusive

source.description: (function) returns the content of a template without rendering it

template_from_string.description: (function) loads a template from a string

twig path.description: use this snippet to get the function path from symfoy

twig encore entry link tags.description: encore_entry_link_tags for loading the css assets

twig encore entry script tags.description: encore_entry_script_tags to load the js from encore packge

twig form display.description: use this snippet to generate the form display in twig via symfony
